title: READY 2 LEARN Glitter Foam Stickers - Alphabet - Pack of 156 Letters - Self-Adhesive Stickers for Kids - Stickers for Scrapbooks, Cards and More
description: Create sparkly scenes and personalize your stuff with foam alphabet stickers! This sticker pack includes 156 letter stickers with 6 each of uppercase letters A-Z. Colors include orange, red, yellow, green, blue and purple. These mess-free stickers don’t require glue and are easy for children to peel and stick. Alphabet stickers are a hands-on, visual tool to practice letter recognition and spelling. Children can also use these stickers to personalize greeting cards, posters, notebooks and more! Crafting with stickers contributes to the development of children’s fine motor skills, hand-eye coordination and creative expression. These thick EVA foam stickers are easy to hold and manipulate. The stickers are non-toxic. For ages 3+. || Size of D: 1.75"L x 2"W.
